channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro.company -- Form to Chat App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro.company -- Form to Chat App

item.title: CVE-2024-31258|2024-08-02T01:46:04.945Z -- micro.company -- form%20to%20chat%20app
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Micro.Company Form to Chat App allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Form to Chat App: from n/a through 1.1.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-31258|2024-06-04T17:36:50.888Z -- micro.company -- form%20to%20chat%20app
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Micro.Company Form to Chat App allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Form to Chat App: from n/a through 1.1.6.
